document.docAuthor: Meisch, Claude, Smith, Robin J. & Martens, Koen
document.masterDocTitle: A subjective global checklist of the extant non-marine Ostracoda (Crustacea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A subjective global checklist of the extant non-marine Ostracoda (Crustacea)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Syn.:
Limnicythere Brady, 1867
(fide G.W. Müller 1912 ; misspelling)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Limnocythere cusminskyae Ramón Mercau et al. , 2014
: NT

Limnocythere hungarica Daday, 1900
: PA (uncertain species, fide Meisch 2000 ) *
Limnocythere inopinata (Baird, 1843) Brady 1867
: AT, NA, PA

Syn.:
Limnocythere inopinata orientalis Ghetti, 1972
(fide Meisch 2000 )

Limnocythere stationis Vávra, 1891
: AT, PA, OL
